item.title: Episode 164: Josh Cohen
item.itunes:author: Mark Williamson
item.itunes:title: Episode 164: Josh Cohen
item.content:encoded:
This week on the podcast host Mark Williamson is joined by food/lifestyle blogger Josh Cohen to talk about the launch of Josh’s new food blog: Where You Goin’ Josh Cohen?

Josh and Mark go way back with Josh being the original sound guy for the podcast back when it first launched.

To find Josh on Insta, Twitter and FB just search Where You Goin’ Josh Cohen.

To find Mark on FB and Twitter go to @MWChatShow 

If you like the podcast please leave us a rating or review and if you didn’t well…………..

item.title: Episode 163: Ray Cashman
item.itunes:author: Mark Williamson
item.itunes:title: Episode 163: Ray Cashman
item.content:encoded:
This week on the chat show host Mark Williamson is joined by comedian/travel agent/entrepreneur/friend Ray Cashman.

Ray is here to talk all about his new project Power Slam the the Wrestling Card Game which he is about to launch on Kickstarter.

For more info on Power Slam The Wrestling Card Game

Email: Powerslamgame@gmail.com

FB: @powerslamcardgame

Insta: @powerslamcardgame

Follow Mark and the show @MWChatShow on Twitter and FB.

item.title: Episode 162: Anil Desai
item.itunes:author: Mark Williamson
item.itunes:title: Episode 162: Anil Desai
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to episode 161 of the podcast, joining host Mark Williamson this week is UK comedian Anil Desai, frequent guest/co-host Peter Meisel and the returning Seizure Kaiser.

In this week’s episode everything and nothing is discussed from Carona to cruises to snakes to the Vietnam war. 

Thanks for listening.

Follow them here:

@mwchatshow

@anildesaicomic

@iamseizure

@petermeisel2

item.title: Episode 161: Peter Meisel
item.itunes:author: Mark Williamson
item.itunes:title: Episode 161: Peter Meisel
item.content:encoded:
“Joining host Mark Williamson this week on the chat show is the one and thankfully only Peter Meisel as they chat about everything and anything.

This week’s episode was recorded live in the beer garden of the Courthouse hotel.

For more Peter Meisel follow him on twitter @PeterMeisel2 or ask your local comedy night when Peter will next be appearing.

For more Mark you can follow him on Twitter or Facebook @MWChatShow.

Thanks for listening.

item.title: Episode 160: Rob and Gareth
item.itunes:author: Mark Williamson
item.itunes:title: Episode 160: Rob and Gareth
item.content:encoded:
Welcome back…or welcome to the Chat Show W/ Mark Williamson.

This episode was recorded on the night Scott Morrison became Prime Minister and was thought lost but then mysteriously turned up. 

Joining Mark this week are comedians Rob Dowley and Gareth Kidd aka Rob and Gareth. Have a listen and be sure a new episode will be available in the not too distant future.

*There is a language warning for this ep, it was late and well we got a little baudy.

Get in touch thru twitter @MWChatShow.

item.title: Episode 159: Shane Adamczak
item.itunes:author: Mark Williamson
item.itunes:title: Episode 159: Shane Adamczak
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to MW’s Chat Show this week host Mark Williamson is joined by West Australian actor/comedian/puppeteer Shane Adamczak live from the infamous Westfield food court.

Mark and Shane first met at the 2007 Melbourne International Comedy Festival. They realiesed whilst recording this that they hadn’t seen each other in person in over 8 years. 

Thanks for listening and if you like the show please rate review and tell all your friends about it.

Follow on twitter @MWChatShow and @ShaneAdamczak

item.title: Episode 158: Gareth Kidd
item.itunes:author: Mark Williamson
item.itunes:title: Episode 158: Gareth Kidd
item.content:encoded:
This week on the podcast sees the debut of Gareth Kidd as he joins host Mark Williamson at Edge HQ. 

The conversation goes from Andrew Denton to finding a pube in your Starbucks Frappachino. Are the two connected? Listen and find out.

Follow us on Twitter Mark @MWChatShow and Gareth @GKTweetsHard.

If listening on iTunes or Stitcher please rate and review.

item.title: Episode 157: Marcus Ryan
item.itunes:author: Mark Williamson
item.itunes:title: Episode 157: Marcus Ryan
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to MW’s Chat Show this week’s guest is globe trotting Comedian Marcus Ryan. 

Marcus is back in Australia for the Melbourne International Comedy Festival, if you’re in Melbourne go along and see his show.

Follow us on social media:

Mark @MWChatShow 

Marcus @itsmarcusryan 

Like the podcast then rate, review and tell your friends. 

Keen to sponsor it or be a guest then email comedyonedge@yahoo.com

item.title: Episode 156: Sydney Fringe Festival
item.itunes:author: Mark Williamson
item.itunes:title: Episode 156: Sydney Fringe Festival
item.content:encoded:
Live from the Sydney Fringe Festival host Mark Williamson and co-host Peter Green bring to you the quiz show Annus Horribilius.

Where two comedians, Carlo Sands and Peter Meisel battle it out with the audience over who knows the most about the year 1984.

*This show was recorded live on the night so there are some flaws in the process. We did not use microphones and just relied on the zoom.

If high quality state of the art recorded podcasts are your thing then maybe give this one a miss. 

Follow everyone on twitter @MWChatShow, @greeny_eter, @PeterMeisel2, @CarloGrubSands and @TheUnOz.

item.title: Episode 155: Seizure Kaiser and Michael French
item.description: Episode 155: Seizure Kaiser and Michael French
item.itunes:author: Mark Williamson
item.itunes:title: Episode 155: Seizure Kaiser and Michael French
item.content:encoded:
It’s road trip time! That’s right host Mark Williamson headed down to Wollongong for a gig and took his recording gear with him. Joining him on the road in the driver’s seat Michael ‘Fluffy’ French and in the back seat Seizure Kaiser.

The conversation was pre-gig and we were driving into a thunder storm. Enjoy!

*This week’s podcast has a bit of a language warning as the conversation got pretty deep (in a funny way). So if you are easily offended maybe skip this one. 

Feedback: Tweet @MWChatShow or email comedyonedge@yahoo.com

item.title: Episode 154: Emma Malik, Peter Green and Michael French
item.description: Episode 154: Emma Malik, Peter Green and Michael French
item.itunes:author: Mark Williamson
item.itunes:title: Episode 154: Emma Malik, Peter Green and Michael French
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to Comedy on EDGE presents MW’s Chat Show. This week it’s a very special episode as it’s a trial show of an upcoming Sydney Fringe Comedy show titled The (un)Australian’s Annus Horribilius.

Host Mark Williamson is joined by Dr Peter Green, Emma Malik and first time guest Michael French as they look at the year 1993 in a format where Michael and Emma compete for points. 

To buy tickets to the live version of this week’s podcast visit here: http://fringecomedy.com.au/single-event?show_id=89

To buy tickets to Emma Malik’s Sydney Fringe show visit here: http://fringecomedy.com.au/single-event?show_id=49

item.title: Episode 153: Francis Blair, Peter Meisel and Carlo Sands
item.description: Episode 153: Francis Blair, Peter Meisel and Carlo Sands
item.itunes:author: Mark Williamson
item.itunes:title: Episode 153: Francis Blair, Peter Meisel and Carlo Sands
item.content:encoded:
This episode was recorded straight after epsiode 151….it was supposed to be released a few weeks later however everyone got confused and started doing call backs to episode 151. So here it is enjoy.

You don’t need to listen to episode 151 to follow on but it helps.

Apologies for the sound there was a glitch with our recording device which has since been fixed.

Keen to hear more from the guests or host then follow on twitter:

@MWChatShow, @PeterMeisel2 and @CarloGrubSands (Francis is not on twitter)

item.title: Episode 152: Peter Meisel, Francis Blair and Carlo Sands
item.description: Episode 152: Peter Meisel, Francis Blair and Carlo Sands
item.itunes:author: Mark Williamson
item.itunes:title: Episode 152: Peter Meisel, Francis Blair and Carlo Sands
item.content:encoded:
Welcome back to all our iTunes listeners!

This week on the podcast host Mark Williamson is joined by Peter Meisel, Francis Blair and Carlo Sands to chat about stupid Americans. 

Language warning, we asked Francis not to swear and he did try but……

On twitter then follow @MWChatShow, @PeterMeisel2 and @CarloGrubSands

Enjoy the podcast then please share on social media tag your friends in and if listening on iTunes and Stitcher then please Rate, Review and Subscribe.

item.title: Episode 151: Road Trip W/Emma Malik
item.itunes:author: Mark Williamson
item.itunes:title: Episode 151: Road Trip W/Emma Malik
item.content:encoded:
And that’s the 150! 

Thank you to everyone who got us here, took awhile but here we are 150 great episodes.

This week on the podcast host Mark Williamson is on the road travelling from Willoughby on Sydney’s North Shore to Ashfield. He’s in the passenger seat and his guest Emma Malik is in the driver’s seat.

On the way they talk about Leichardt, Emma’s travels including competing on Thailand’s got talent and they’re constantly interrupted by the bloody GPS.

Enjoy the episode and thank you all for listening.

*Disclaimer this was recorded on the road so sound is not the best.

**We also ended the ep early but don’t worry Emma will be back.

For more follow Mark on twitter @MWChatShow

item.title: Episode 150: Peter Gleeson
item.itunes:author: Mark Williamson
item.itunes:title: Episode 150: Peter Gleeson
item.content:encoded:
This week on the Chat Show host Mark Williamson (@MWChatShow) chats to 4 time guest Peter Gleeson (PeterGleeson1) and they don’t just chat about anything they chat music.

It’s a change of format where Mark asked Peter to bring along an album and they discuss that….what was the album? Tune in and listen.

Apologies one of the mic leads is loose and it plays up in the first couple of minutes but it’s fixed straight after. 

Also this is episode 149….episode 150 is coming however it may be a few weeks off. 

Tickets to Mark’s show and Peter’s show are available at www,sydneycomedyfest.com.au

item.title: Episode 149: Carlo Sands and Peter Gleeson
item.description: Episode 149: Carlo Sands and Peter Gleeson
item.itunes:author: Mark Williamson
item.itunes:title: Episode 149: Carlo Sands and Peter Gleeson
item.content:encoded:
Welcome back to MW’s Chat Show, this week host Mark Williamson is joined by returning guest Carlo Sands and first time (kind of) guest Peter Gleeson.

They talk about festivals, Bill Leak, Miranda Devine and Daisy Cousens to name but a few topics.

As well Peter is about to do a show in the Sydney Comedy Festival with comedian Maslow called Frazzled and Mark and Carlo are doing a show under The (un)Australian banner. To buy tickets visit www.sydneycomedyfest.com.au 

Follow us all on twitter @MWChatShow, @CarloGrubSands and @PeterGleeson1

item.title: Episode 148: MW Oh!
item.itunes:author: Mark Williamson
item.itunes:title: Episode 148: MW Oh!
item.content:encoded:
This week on the Chat Show host Mark Williamson chats to himself, what?

Well, Mark talks about the formation of Comedy on the EDGE back when it was a little comedy club in Darlinghurst. Or more specifically he talks about the man, the myth, the legend that is Ballsack. Yep Ballsack not Balzac, Scro to his friends.

This episode covers the Green Faces Comedy Competition, Eddie Ifft, Racism in Comedy, the prank Mark pulled on George Pana that almost killed him and so much more.

For more information follow Mark on twitter @MWChatShow and to get in touch please email comedyonedge@yahoo.com

item.title: Episode 147: Peter Green Returns
item.itunes:author: Mark Williamson
item.itunes:title: Episode 147: Peter Green Returns
item.content:encoded:
It’s part 2 of Peter Green and Mark Williamson’s look at the year 1984.

If you haven’t listened to Part 1 then go back and listen, we’ll wait.

Apologies the intro was recorded a couple of weeks ago so some info is a little out of date, next week we will have all new info and a little better editing.

Please direct all complaints to comedyonedge@yahoo.com or tweet Mark @MWChatShow.

To talk to Peter Green pleae tweet @Greeny_Peter

item.title: Episode 146: Peter Green and 1984
item.itunes:author: Mark Williamson
item.itunes:title: Episode 146: Peter Green and 1984
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to The (un)Australian the podcast wait, what?

No it’s the Chat Show W/Mark Williamson and this week he’s joined by regular guest Peter Green and they look at the year 1984.

This week’s episode was a pilot for another podcast that may happen later in the year but at this stage we thought we’d release it here. Now this is a 2 part episode cause it was a big year. Look for part 2 dropping on Wednesday. 

If you have any memories or thoughts about 1984 then tweet @MWChatShow or @Greeny_Peter.

Thanks for listening….also if you’re listening via Stitcher radio then please rate and review. 

And for all your satirical needs please visit theunaustralian.net

item.title: Episode 145: Carlo Sands and Peter Green
item.description: Episode 145: Carlo Sands and Peter Green
item.itunes:author: Mark Williamson
item.itunes:title: Episode 145: Carlo Sands and Peter Green
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to the Chat Show with Mark Williamson, appearing this week on the show is frequent guest and occasional co-host Peter Green and the comedian who geographically lives closest to Mark’s house, Carlo Sands.

This week’s chat revolves around Politics, Greeny’s prostate, Soccer (sorry Football) and many many more topics.

Now you may notice that this week there is no music or introduction sorry about that, technical/Mark is not a great sound guy issues. The music will be back next week.

Need to hear more from any of the guests or hosts, then follow them on twitter @MWChatShow, @CarloGrubSands or @greeny_peter. 

Also be sure to check out theunaustralian.net the satirical website that Mark, Carlo and Greeny write for.

item.title: Episode 144: Peter Meisel
item.itunes:author: Mark Williamson
item.itunes:title: Episode 144: Peter Meisel
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to the chat show with your host Mark Williamson, joining the show this week is frequent guest (more like a co-host) Peter Meisel.

On the agenda this week is Peter’s new career on TV (really he is on TV), people who believe the world is flat and there’s a special surprise guest (who doesn’t actually speak).

Need more of Mark and Peter then follow them on twitter @MWChatShow and @PeterMeisel2 or PeterMeisel1 (this is a parody account that may or not be run by Mark).

Also tune into the B team with Peter Berner on Sky News where Peter Meisel is a frequent guest.

item.title: Episode 143: Mick Meredith, Frida Deguise and Peter Meisel
item.description: Episode 143: Mick Meredith, Frida Deguise and Peter Meisel
item.itunes:author: Mark Williamson
item.itunes:title: Episode 143: Mick Meredith, Frida Deguise and Peter Meisel
item.content:encoded:
Happy New Year!

The Chat Show is back and this week host Mark Williamson is joined by returning guest the very talented Mick Meredith, on debut the rising star that is Frida Deguise and well he’s not really a guest more like a co-host everyone’s favourite dirty Grandpa Peter Meisel.

They chat about anything and everything from exercise (yes really), serial killers, veganism and how Peter Meisel almost died on an exercise bike.

On twitter then follow Mark @MWOh44, Mick @mick_meredith and Peter Meisel @PeterMeisel2 there is a Frida Deguise on twitter but we don;t think it’s an official page (unless she really is a business resale specialist).

New episodes drop every Monday.

item.title: Episode 142: Andrew Paskin
item.itunes:author: Mark Williamson
item.itunes:title: Episode 142: Andrew Paskin
item.content:encoded:
Hang on who’s Andrew Paskin, aren’t you Lester Diamond?

Confused, listen to the episode and it will all make sense, well as much sense as you can get with two dudes hanging out in a food court recording a podcast.

That’s right Comedy on EDGE presents the Chat show is back with host Mark Williamson and guest Andrew Paskin. 

This week we chat about Andrew/Lester’s trip to Japan, Andre the Giant, Michel Clarke, Chicken Sashimi, CM Punk, the Yakuza and of course Colin ‘Funky’ Miller.

Got something to say about the episode then tweet us @comedyonedge or @MWOh44, for complaints about Andrew/Lester then tweet @AndrewPaskin.

Thanks for listeneing Peeps and if you liked the show then spread the word.

item.itunes:title: Episode 141: Peter Green and Peter Meisel

Live from EDGE HQ Host and now Sound Engineer Mark Williamson is joined by Peter Meisel and Peter Green as they chat about everything and anything. 

Follow us on twitter @MWOh44 (Mark), @greeny_peter, @PeterMeisel2 and @comedyonedge.

**Or if you want to sponsor the show or make a donation get in touch.

item.title: Episode 140: Andrew Barnett and Peter Meisel
item.description: Episode 140: Andrew Barnett and Peter Meisel
item.itunes:author: Mark Williamson
item.itunes:title: Episode 140: Andrew Barnett and Peter Meisel
item.content:encoded:
This week on Comedy on EDGE presents the Chat Show we are live from the Factory Theatre as part of the Sydney Fringe Festival. That’s right we packed up the couch, the mics and Lester and took the show live to an almost full house.

Joining host Mark Williamson is Ryan “Special Comments’ Crawford, Lester ‘No Gimmick Necessary’ Diamond, Peter ‘Again’ Meisel and Andrew Barnett.

LIke the show, then tell your friends, foes or twitter followers and stay tuned as we announce more Live shows in the not to distant future.

For more info follow us on twitter @comedyonedge, @MW__Oh, @RyanTheCrawford, @LesterDiamond28, PeterMeisel2 and @MrABarnett.

item.title: Episode 138: David McNevin and Ben Squires
item.description: Episode 138: David McNevin and Ben Squires
item.itunes:author: Mark Williamson
item.itunes:title: Episode 138: David McNevin and Ben Squires
item.content:encoded:
This week on the podcast, host Mark Williamson is joined by Ryan ‘Special Comments’ Crawford, Lester ‘World’s Worst Sound Guy’ Diamond and on debut, guests Ben Squires and David (or is it Dave?) McNevin.

The big topic of conversation revolves around how Ben went to school with Australia’s new Cricket Captain Steve Smith and the boys try to figure out how it could help his career.

As well the Sydney Fringe Festival was discussed as Dave and Ben are about to make their Festival debut at the Sydney Fringe Festival in the show Ben and Dave go to the Factory for more details visit: http://fringecomedy.com.au/single-event?show_id=927

And Ryan is also making his solo show debut at the Frin ge in his show Damage Control for more information visit here:

http://fringecomedy.com.au/single-event?show_id=966

Follow us all on twitter Mark @MW__Oh, Ryan @RyanTheCrawford, Lester @LesterDiamond28, Ben Squire @squires_ben, David @mcnevin_d and Comedy on EDGE @comedyonedge

iTunes peeps be sure to rate and review each episode for some strange reason it really helps and costs nothing other than time.

item.title: Epiosde 137: Al Del Bene and Peter Meisel
item.description: Epiosde 137: Al Del Bene and Peter Meisel
item.itunes:author: Mark Williamson
item.itunes:title: Epiosde 137: Al Del Bene and Peter Meisel
item.content:encoded:
We’re back! Live from the Chippendale hotel it’s Comedy on EDGE presents the Chat show this week host Mark Williamson is joined by Ryan ‘Special Comments’ Crawford, Lester Diamond and guests Al Del Bene and Peter Meisel.

This week Lester Diamond shows some initiative and has some questions to ask Al Del Bene, admittedly they’re all about Al’s friends, Dane Cook and Bill Burr but at least he tried.

As well Al Del Bene tells about the two occasions that he met the Artist formerly or is it currently known as Prince.

If you like the show please rate, review and subscribe via iTunes or tell your friends about us.

 

On twitter? If so follow Mark (@MW__Oh), Ryan (RyanTheCrawford), Lester (LesterDiamon28), Al Del Bene (@AlDelBene) and Peter Meisel (@PeterMeisel2).

This week host Mark Williamson and co-host Ryan ‘Special Comments’ Crawford have a chat. They did start the recording with Lester Diamond but he went missing and did come back after the record was over with a parking ticket.

item.title: Episode 133: Road Trip Part Deux
item.itunes:author: Mark Williamson
item.itunes:title: Episode 133: Road Trip Part Deux
item.content:encoded:
This week we have an episode that we forgot about, last year host of the podcast Mark Williamson did a gig in Newcastle and on the way home to Sydney he had a chat with fellow Comedians Sam Kissajukian and Daniel Muggleton.

Now disclaimer Daniel was driving and Sam was in the backseat and we drove past a lot of trucks so audio isn’t the best (not too bad just a lot of car noise).

Follow us all on twitter 

@comedyonedge, @MW__Oh, @danmuggleton and @samkissaju. 

PS Live Show at the Factory Theatre, September 12th. Tix onsale soon.

item.itunes:title: Episode 130: Ryan Crawford and Lester Diamond
item.content:encoded:
Welcome everybody to Comedy on EDGE presents the Chat Show we are back after an extended hiatus recording live from EDGE HQ. This week host Mark Williamson is joined by Ryan ‘Special Comments’ Crawford and half man, well actually half a man Lester Diamond.

There is discussion a plenty this episode as we cover the big issues like why Barnaby Joyce should have shot Johnny Depp, the Royal Family; are they completely pointless? And beards this may have had something to do with the Queen.

New episodes of the podcast drop every Monday morning on iTunes, Libsyn and www.comedyonedge.com. If you like the podcast then please tell your friends, tweet about us help spread the word. If you don’t like the podcast then please go to iTunes and tell us what you think in the review section.

item.description: Episode 129: Josh Cohen and Peter Meisel
item.itunes:author: Mark Williamson
item.itunes:title: Episode 129: Josh Cohen and Peter Meisel
item.content:encoded:
This week on Comedy on EDGE presents the Chat Show it’s a full house as Host Mark Williamson is joined by Ryan ‘Special Comments’ Crawford, Lester Diamond, Josh Cohen and the one (and thankfully) only Peter Meisel.

Join them as they talk fancy dress, Lester’s lack of life and the fact that one of them has to leave early as they have a gig (who it is will shock you).

If you like the Podcast please tell your friends, tweet about it, instagram it or share a link on facebook. Or if you’re listening via iTunes rate, review and subscribe.

To follow us on twittter checkout @comedyonedge, @MW__Oh, @RyanTheCrawford, @LesterDiamond28, @hungry_dude and @PeterMeisel2

item.title: Episode 128: Carlo Sands
item.itunes:author: Mark Williamson
item.itunes:title: Episode 128: Carlo Sands
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to Comedy on EDGE presents the Chat show live from our new EDGE HQ, this week host Mark Williamson (@MW__Oh) is joined by Ryan ‘Special Comments’ Crawford (@RyanTheCrawford) and the Mayor of Summer Hill (not really the official Mayor) Carlo Sands (@CarloSands). 

Join them as they chat about Soccer, Carlo being a Wanderers, Ryan being a Sydney FC fan and Mark being a not interested in Soccer fan, as well they discuss moving house and how delicious it is to eat a raw onion.

If you like the podcast tell your friends, tweet about it, facebook about it, instagram about it and thank you for listening. 

For more info follow us on twitter @comedyonedge

item.title: Episode 127: Gooodbye
item.itunes:author: Mark Williamson
item.itunes:title: Episode 127: Gooodbye
item.content:encoded:
This week it’s time to say Goodbye to….EDGE HQ, that’s right after nearly 10 years host of the podcast Mark Williamson has decided to relocate EDGE HQ from the Chippendale to Summer Hill, so this is the last episode recorded at old EDGE HQ.

Joining Mark this week to say Goodbye is Ryan ‘Special Comments’ Crawford and a man who’s middle name should be Goodbye because most people who meet him wish that’s what they could say to him.

 

If you like the podcast please tell your friends, enemies, Twitter/Instagram/Facebook followers or just tell us you like it via twitter @comedyonedge, email info@comedyonedge.com or in the ratings part of iTunes

item.title: Episode 126: Alex Wasiel
item.itunes:author: Mark Williamson
item.itunes:title: Episode 126: Alex Wasiel
item.content:encoded:
Phil Smythe’s back and this time’s it personal!

Welcome everybody to Comedy on EDGE presents the Chat show, this week host Mark Williamson is joined by everybody’s favourite sound guy Ryan Crawford and everybody’s favourite failure Lester Diamond.

But wait there’s more due, to our increasing ability to potentially defame, slander or call out local businesses or late 80’s NBL stars we have called in the Lawyer’s, well one Lawyer, our guest this week is Comedian/Lawyer Alex Wasiel.

Join us as we discuss Mark’s calling out of Ray White Real Estate and Lester’s ongoing battle with Phil Smythe.

Like the podcast then tell your friends about us, on iTunes rate, review or subscribe.

Twitter follow us all @comedyonedge, @MW__Oh, @LesterDiamond28, @RyanTheCrawford and @alexwasiel.

Hi Everybody,

This week we had a set back, namely our host Mark Williamson has no voice, so we couldn’t record an episode, we thought about not releasing an ep but then we remembered that we had some pretty cool back episodes and we decided to re-release one. Which one?

This is episode 49 where Mark (with voice) chats to fellow Tasmanian Josh Earl, you may know him from Spicks and Specks.

Have listen and never fear we will have new episodes coming up next year, also Josh Earl is currently touring the nation, so if you like the episode go see him as he is very funny (www.joshearl.com.au)

Also DISCLAIMER at the start of the EP we advertise a LIVE Fringe show which was last year, so don’t go looking for tickets it’s been and gone, however both Mark and Ryan do have fringe shows coming up.

Live from New York it’s……

Comedy on EDGE presents the Chat Show.

Start spreading the news, we are live in New York City with host Mark Williamson chatting to one of our favourite past guests Scott Dooley.

Recording live in the East Village the boys chat about Hulk Hogan’s Pastamania, Mark’s looming court battle against the makers of High Fructose Corn Syrup and what’s Scott’s been up to in New York (did someone say new Comedy Festival show).

Now, this episode may sound a little strange (audio wise). This is due to us recording without microphones. Sorry if the episode sounds like we are hopped up on coke and shouting.

item.itunes:title: Episode 072: Scott Dettrick, Matty B and Andrew Barnett
item.content:encoded:
“Duds down at the urinal!”

It’s a full-house at EDGE HQ as we re-launch Comedy on EDGE the Podcast as Comedy on EDGE presents the Chat Show. What does this mean? Not much, just a name change, nothing else.

Joining us this week is returning guests Matty B and Andrew Barnett as well as debutant Scott Dettrick, as well as Jasmine the Intern and Junior-Assistant Producer Lester Diamond.

Why so many guests? Well Matty, Andrew and Scott are about to head off to the Adelaide Fringe Festival to do a show called 3 Blokes telling jokes, if you’re in Adelaide or have Friends in Adelaide then get along to what will be a great festival show. Also stay tuned Sydney as the show , shows to be announced soon.

For more info please visit www.comedyonedge.com

item.title: Episode 045: Laura Imbruglia and Jeremy Keast
item.description: Episode 045: Laura Imbruglia and Jeremy Keast
item.itunes:author: Mark Williamson
item.itunes:title: Episode 045: Laura Imbruglia and Jeremy Keast
item.content:encoded:
First up I (Mark Williamson host of the Podcast) would like to apologise to Ryan Crawford as I forgot to introduce him on this week’s episode of the Podcast, for those wondering yes he was in the techie’s chair and yes he did a great job. And no he is not holding a spider in a jar next to me and making me write this.

This week on the podcast we are back at EDGE HQ and joined by Singer-Songwriter and Footballer Laura Imbruglia and good friend of the show Jeremy Keast.

We chat about everything from Laura’s new album, What a Treat (available at all good record stores and iTunes), Keasty thought’s on Oasis, Blur, Coldplay and every other band we mention and so much more.

Have a listen and don’t forget Spetember  11th and 18th we are at the factory theatre for the Sydney Fringe Festival. For more info please check out www.comedyonedge.com

For more info on Laura Imbruglia check out www.lauraimbruglia.com (also follow her on twitter www.twitter.com/lauraimbruglia )

 

﻿

item.title: Episode 044: Clint Paddison
item.itunes:author: Mark Williamson
item.itunes:title: Episode 044: Clint Paddison
item.content:encoded:
“Don’t mention the war!”

This week at EDGE HQ host Mark Williamson is joined in the techie’s chair by Ryan ‘Special Comments’ Crawford and they chat to Laser physisist turned Speed dating mogul turned Comedian Clint Paddison.

 

The boys chat about Clint’s past careers, his time in Iraq and iconic Sydney Comedy venue the ‘Pickled’ Frog. As well we also talk about the live Sydney Fringe show (September 11th an 18th 9 pm Factory Theatre).

 

If you’re wondering what the background booing and cheering is, this episode was recorded downstairs at the Lybrary hotl during game 7 of the NBA finals. For the ful experience listen to the Podcast whilst watching the second half of the game.

item.title: Episode 040: Sol Bernstien
item.itunes:author: Mark Williamson
item.itunes:title: Episode 040: Sol Bernstien
item.content:encoded:
Live from Comedy on EDGE’s HQ the Lybrary Hotel host Mak Williamson is joined by the (barely) living legend all the way from the UK Sol Bernstien. Sitting in the techie’s chair is Ryan Crawford (all complaints about audio please contact Ryan) and we also have sitting in, not so special guest, Seizure Kaiser.

 

Join us as we talk about Sol’s illustrious career, spanning from the wild’s of Soviet Russia, through New York and onto London. We discuss the characters he’s worked with over the years like Adolf Hitler and Peter Meisel.

 

We also have a big announcement about Comedy on EDGE’s next BIG live show.

Like the episode then follow the everybody on twitter. @comedyonedge, @M_W_Oh, @RyanTheCrawford & @iamseizure

item.content:encoded:
